about_the_game: City Zombie is a 2D survival game set in a city overrun by zombies. You must face hordes of enemies that grow stronger and more numerous over time. Choose to flee and hide or fight to survive, earning money by defeating zombies. Use your earnings to buy items and upgrades from the store, such as increased max health, medical kits, ammo, bombs, and improvements to your weapon damage and melee combat skills. How far can you go?
detailed_description: City Zombie is a 2D survival game set in a city overrun by zombies. You must face hordes of enemies that grow stronger and more numerous over time. Choose to flee and hide or fight to survive, earning money by defeating zombies. Use your earnings to buy items and upgrades from the store, such as increased max health, medical kits, ammo, bombs, and improvements to your weapon damage and melee combat skills. How far can you go?
name: Survivor's Dawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits
  • Processor: Core i3 4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5 230
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: Survive in a challenging 2D zombie game! Face hordes of the undead, earn money by defeating them, and buy upgrades to increase your health, ammo, and more. How far can you go?
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Kannada, Catalan, Kazakh, Cherokee, Sinhala, Konkani, Croatian, Dari, Slovak, Slovenian, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Welsh, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Yoruba, Irish, Icelandic, Khmer, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, K'iche', Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Quechua, Sotho, Sindhi, Sorani, Swahili, Serbian, Tajik, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Tatar, Tamil, Telugu, Uyghur, Wolof, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Xhosa, Zulu, Scots
